channel.title: How do you edit .msstyles files? (Win XP)
channel.description:
How would I edit .msstyles files? I have this theme that I really like, but it's taskbar is thinner, making windows media player cause it to stretch every time it's minimized. I want to edit the style to have the same taskbar thickness as the original theme. How would I do that?
[img]https://img375.imageshack.us/img375/2029/helpb.png[/img] Here's a picture to show what I mean.

item.title: How do you edit .msstyles files? (Win XP)
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.source: How do you edit .msstyles files? (Win XP)

item.title: How do you edit .msstyles files? (Win XP)

item.description:
Yeah, I already tired that, and I have no idea what I’m supposed to be doing. Can you point to a tutorial?

Read full topic
